title: Two-Faced Best Friend
itunes:title: Two-Faced Best Friend
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my best friend and were really close for 10 years. We were more like sisters and we told each other all of our secrets. Last year, she played cupid between me and one of her male friends. The guy and I have been together since then and we are very happy. I never let my new relationship affect my friendship with her. Everything was great between my best friend and I until a few months ago. She randomly stopped answering my calls and her excuse was that she was going through some things. I explained to her that I was there for her if she needed to talk...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my best friend and were really close for 10 years. We were more like sisters and we told each other all of our secrets. Last year, she played cupid between me and one of her male friends. The guy and I have been together since then and we are very happy. I never let my new relationship affect my friendship with her. Everything was great between my best friend and I until a few months ago. She randomly stopped answering my calls and her excuse was that she was going through some things. I explained to her that I was there for her if she needed to talk...............
